about:
Multilingual software developer born in Spain now living in South Korea, I spent the 2 first years of my career working for the video game industry and the last 2 years making web apps. 
 My current stack is vueJS, nodeJS and mysql on Linux but I enjoy learning and trying new technologies.
I love tinkering and trying out new things. I am looking for new challenges in a welcoming work environment.

history.title: Internship at Catalonia hotels & resorts, Barcelona
history.desc:
Fixed computers and created local environments for this hotel chain to operate world wide.
I obtained a lot of real world experience and provided real help in exchange.
Thanks to this job I know a lot about computers and maintenance.

history.title: Junior Developer at abylight studios,Barcelona
history.desc:
Developed high quality iOS and apple watch projects. Mostly creating tools and pipelines.
My favorite thing about this job was automating work and helping my colleagues to be more productive.

history.title: Full Stack developer at SAIDLITE, Seoul
history.desc:
Developed a myriad of web applications using vue 2/3.Also written backends using node.js and express.js.
What I loved the most about this job was that I had the opportunity to learn a lot about networking technologies and I was free to use linux as my daily driver OS.
I also had to deploy the applications myself so I had a full understanding on how the whole application worked.
